sources.title: The Guilty
sources.description: Title: The Guilty Summary: Two guys, sharing an apartment, meet twin girls (both Bonita Granville). One's sweet, the other a major piece of bad news. The nice one is murdered and her boyfriend is accused of the crime. The wrong man-wrong victim plot strikes again. Directed by: John Reinhardt Actors: Bonita Granville, Don Castle, Regis Toomey Production Company: Monogram Pictures Release Date: 22 March 1947 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Two guys, sharing an apartment, meet twin girls (both Bonita Granville). One's sweet, the other a major piece of bad news. The nice one is murdered and her boyfriend is accused of the crime. The wrong man-wrong victim plot strikes again.

sources.title: 1947 - The Guilty - John Reinhardt - VO
